about_the_game:
A new choose-your-path comic by the creator of Meanwhile. Help Little Jimmy, Kid Detective to solve: The Case of the Missing Science Project!

  • Follow the arrows from panel to panel.
  • If an arrow goes off the page, turn the page and follow the arrow around the edge.
  • Make choices wherever the arrows branch.
  • Secrets, mayhem, and velociraptors await!

Note: This is an interactive comic, but it is not played on your computer. This DLC package contains a PDF file which you can print out, fold, and staple to produce your very own mini-comic!

(The PDF is formatted for a double-sided printer. For best results, use a long-arm stapler.)

The Case of the Missing Science Project is copyright 2016 by Jason Shiga. It was originally published in Comics Squad: Lunch! Edited by Jennifer L. Holm, Matthew Holm, and Jarrett J. Krosoczka; published by Random House, 2016.
